definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)

sentences.english: You are required only to put the one or two-letter chemical abbreviation, the symbol.
sentences.chinese: 你們只需要，用一兩個字母來代表一個化學元素。

sentences.english: It could also be break down and be component part ---oxygen and hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 水也可以分解成化學元素，氧和氫。

sentences.english: They can also be used to map the distribution of certain chemical elements.
sentences.chinese: 它們也可用來給某些化學元素繪製分佈圖。

sentences.english: It is very heavy and chemically resembles arsenic and antimony.
sentences.chinese: 像砷和銻一樣，鉍也是重金屬和重化學元素。

sentences.english: What's the chemical symbol for mercury?
sentences.chinese: 汞的化學元素符號是什麼？

sentences.english: Tidies up in the medication ingredient has the harm chemical element.
sentences.chinese: 整容的用藥成份裏有有危害的化學元素。

sentences.english: At this point, chemical element periodic law is found to work has been successfully completed.
sentences.chinese: 至此，化學元素週期律的發現工作已圓滿完成。

sentences.english: Au is the chemical symbol for gold.
Phosphorus Nonmetallic chemical element, chemical symbol P, atomic number 15.
sentences.chinese: 非金屬化學元素，化學符號P，原子序數15。

sentences.english: Today we continue our report on the group of chemical elements known as rare earth metals.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們將繼續報道稀土金屬類的稀有化學元素。

sentences.english: Darbon and hydrogen are chemical elements.
Callahan posits that chemical elements radiate electromagnetic signals.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉漢假定化學元素放射電磁信號。

sentences.english: Everybody please take out a piece of paper and write the periodic table from memory.
sentences.chinese: 請大家拿出一張紙，默寫化學元素週期表。

sentences.english: Au is the chemical symbol for gold.
What chemicals combine together to form water?
sentences.chinese: 什麼化學元素化合成水？

definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]
mutually related karma (idiom); fates are intertwined/interdependent
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
